Uses of Interface
org.nodex.java.core.Deferred

  • Packages that use Deferred 
    Package Description
    org.nodex.java.core  
    org.nodex.java.core.composition  
    org.nodex.java.core.file  

    • Uses of Deferred in org.nodex.java.core

      Classes in org.nodex.java.core that implement Deferred 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BlockingAction<T>
      Sometimes it is necessary to perform operations in node.x which are inherently blocking, e.g.
      class  DeferredAction<T>
      DeferredAction is useful when you want to create your own Deferred actions.
      class  SimpleAction
      An Implementation of Deferred which can be used to implement custom synchronous actions.
      class  SynchronousAction<T>
      A subclass of DeferredAction which can be used to implement custom synchronous actions.
      Methods in org.nodex.java.core that return Deferred 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Deferred<T> Deferred.execute()
      Execute the deferred operation.
      Deferred<T> DeferredAction.execute()
      Execute the deferred operation.
      Deferred<T> Deferred.handler(CompletionHandler<T> handler)
      Set a handler on the Future.
      Deferred<T> DeferredAction.handler(CompletionHandler<T> completionHandler)
      Set a handler on the Future.

    • Uses of Deferred in org.nodex.java.core.composition

      Methods in org.nodex.java.core.composition with parameters of type Deferred 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T> Future<T> Composer.parallel(Deferred<T> deferred)
      Add a Deferred to be executed in parallel with any other Deferred instances added using this method since the last time (if any) the Composer.series(org.nodex.java.core.Deferred<T>) method was invoked.
      <T> Future<T> Composer.series(Deferred<T> deferred)
      Adds a Deferred that will be executed after any other Deferred instances that were added to this Composer have completed.

    • Uses of Deferred in org.nodex.java.core.file

      Methods in org.nodex.java.core.file that return Deferred 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Deferred<java.lang.Void> FileSystem.chmodDeferred(java.lang.String path, java.lang.String perms)
      The same as FileSystem.chmod(String, String) but the chmod does not start until the execute() method is called on the Deferred instance returned by this method.
      Deferred<java.lang.Void> FileSystem.chmodDeferred(java.lang.String path, java.lang.String perms, java.lang.String dirPerms)
      The same as FileSystem.chmod(String, String, String) but the chmod does not start until the execute() method is called on the Deferred instance returned by this method.
      Deferred<java.lang.Void> AsyncFile.closeDeferred()
      The same as AsyncFile.close() but the close does not start until the execute() method is called on the Deferred instance returned by this method.
      Deferred<java.lang.Void> FileSystem.copyDeferred(java.lang.String from, java.lang.String to)
      The same as FileSystem.copy(String, String) but the copy does not start until the execute() method is called on the Deferred instance returned by this method.
